@ErinBrockovich We are trying everything... 5,899 calls in MARCH alone just about our local landfill to the @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency and we are still not been listened to. No one is taking this as seriously. Our lives are been ruined.
@StinkStopthe #StopTheStink #newcastleunderlyme

Thank you for raising this Aaron. Both @PHE_uk and @EnvAgencyMids need to have more urgency in their effort and actions to stop the stink and to reassure local people re health  implications. https://t.co/T2B2okOHA8

tweets.text: Westlands is full of landfill gas again, starting to smell it in the house again so likely in for another night of health effects & no sleep. Shame on you @EnvAgency and your duplicity in this outrage on our health. Shame on you @PHE_EoEngland for not protecting our health
@fayedavies @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL Same here,w e've taped up the front door, sounds crazy but we are desperate & can't stand many more nights like last night #StopTheStink
@EnvAgency  Urgent action required. We are prisoners in our own homes ! https://t.co/ujpAoNfzrH

Reported the landfill stench to @EnvAgency again, filling my home, all windows/doors closed. This means no sleep for me or my partner who is a key worker and gets off shift at 3am. Disgusting. You need to resolve this. It is unbearable @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink
@RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency having to stop the kids from playing outside with the dog because the smell coming from walleys landfill #StopTheStink stop ignoring an entire borough you pricks.

Heartbreaking that our children‚Äôs play areas are no longer safe in Newcastle Under Lyme @robbiewilliams A school closer to has to let the gas out of the school every morning before they can let the children in. Help us with your voice & platform @BBCPanorama https://t.co/39zBmcsFC5

The town has had enough @BBCPanorama @BBCAmos  Can you help us to investigate why the @EnvAgency have failed to stop landfill fumes from polluting the inside of our homes with our doors & windows shut spiralling into thousands of complaints at weekends? @StinkStopthe #panorama https://t.co/pAoafB98x4
